```verilog
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic d,
    input logic r,
    output logic q
);
    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (r) begin
            q <= 1'b0;
        end else begin
            q <= d;
        end
    end
endmodule
```

iterations.code:
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic d,
    input logic r,
    output logic q
);
    always @(*) begin
        if (r) begin
            q = 1'b0;
        end else begin
            q = d;
        end
    end

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (r) begin
            q <= 1'b0;
        end else begin
            q <= d;
        end
    end
endmodule
